summary: This cable discusses Ray's contacts in Paris, including Jervay, Unrumble 6, Unpapist, and Alberto Brez Vito. It also mentions Cabrera's potential work on Arcos, Kubark staffer's interactions with Ray, and Ray's confidence in Franqui joining his camp. The cable further details Ray's plans to identify disaffected elements in Cuba and build a supply apparatus. It also includes Ray's requests for a list of Cuban embassies, training in a specific system, and a job for Cabrera.
title: PARI 9068: RAY CONTACTS AND PLANS
